name: Legends RPG
description:
itch.io Version Of Legends RPG

GameJolt Version Here:  https://gamejolt.com/games/LegendsRPG/392791

A Game Im making In RPG Maker MV (Please don't make fun of it this is the first ever game (not on roblox) I ever Made) Age Rating: 10+.  Here is The Link To The Official Legends RPG Website https://doomedmedal93.wixsite.com/legendsrpg
Includes:
Achievements In Game
4 Heroes In Your Party
And More
Thanks For Playing!
